knight.shortInfo: A knight is giving you +1 on a castle.

overlay.title: Quests
overlay.info: Solve the quests to learn more about the game and get great rewards!

firstCastle.title: Welcome to Hammer Castle! Build your first Castle and start your journey...
firstCastle.message: To build a castle just click on the build "Build castle for ..." at the bottom of your screen.

firstWarehouse.title: Build your first warehouse!
firstWarehouse.message: Click on a road between two of your castles to build a warehouse. (You need a second castle!)

fiveCastles.title: Build five castles!
fiveCastles.message: Conquer the world and expand your empire. The more castles you have, the stronger you are!

fiveWarehouses.title: Build five warehouses!
fiveWarehouses.message: Warehouses do store your hammers and your beer. If your empire shall grow, you need more warehouses!

topNavigation.hammerDescription: Hammer are produced by castles and stored in warehouses.
topNavigation.beerDescription: Beer is produced by castles level 5+ and consumed by knights. Do always have enough beer!
